title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: outlines propose change admiraldiscovery. detailed discussion contributing tidyverse packages, please see development contributing guide code review principles.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: ready make release, follow steps: Run R CMD Checks ensure notes, warnings, errors. Run usethis::use_version() bump version release version (.e. removing *.9xxx suffix). changes merged main branch, run usethis::use_github_release() main branch. release made, check website correctly published run usethis::use_dev_version() bump version number development version number.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: update made variable listing (inst/adrmial-lookup-book.csv), run (data-raw/DATASET.R) script add updates internal dataset.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("pharmaverse/admiraldiscovery", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to admiraldiscovery
text: Please note admiraldiscovery project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

title: Discover admiral Functions
text: repository reference users admiral family packages discover various admiral-related pieces information. Variable Listing tab, users can explore functions can used derive many variables parameters ADaM data sets. Presentation Archive tab, users can find collection presentations featuring admiral related packages. Use links navigation bar browse contents repository.

title: Report Package Versions — admiral_pkg_versions
text: Function returns string listing packages versions.

code: admiral_pkg_versions() #> admiral v1.3.0, admiralonco v1.2.0, admiralophtha v1.2.0, admiralvaccine v0.4.0, and admiralmetabolic v0.1.0

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: get_admiral_deprecated(): Returns tibble deprecated functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_admiral_superseded(): Returns tibble superseded functions admiral, admiralonco, admiralophtha, admiralvaccine packages. get_fns_with_keyword(): Returns character vector functions passed keyword help file. example, function can used find deprecated superseded functions admiral universe, admiral package include #' @keywords deprecated #' @keywords superseded function's roxygen2 comments.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated()  get_admiral_superseded()  get_fns_with_keyword(package, keyword, lib.loc = NULL)

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: package character string naming installed package. keyword string keyword identify lib.loc character vector directory names R libraries,     NULL.  default value NULL corresponds     libraries currently known.  specified library trees used     search package.

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
text: character vector function names

title: Find Functions with Keyword — get_keyword_fns
code: get_admiral_deprecated() #> # A tibble: 8 × 2 #>   package fn                          #>   <chr>   <chr>                       #> 1 admiral call_user_fun               #> 2 admiral date_source                 #> 3 admiral derive_param_extreme_record #> 4 admiral derive_var_dthcaus          #> 5 admiral derive_var_extreme_dt       #> 6 admiral derive_var_extreme_dtm      #> 7 admiral dthcaus_source              #> 8 admiral get_summary_records         get_admiral_superseded() #> # A tibble: 8 × 2 #>   package       fn                          #>   <chr>         <chr>                       #> 1 admiralonco   derive_param_bor            #> 2 admiralonco   derive_param_clinbenefit    #> 3 admiralonco   derive_param_confirmed_bor  #> 4 admiralonco   derive_param_confirmed_resp #> 5 admiralonco   derive_param_response       #> 6 admiralonco   filter_pd                   #> 7 admiralophtha derive_var_bcvacritxfl      #> 8 admiralophtha derive_var_bcvacritxfl_util get_fns_with_keyword(package = "admiral", keyword = "superseded") #> NULL
